response.overview: Los Angeles 2028 - a military escalation between China and the United States has had devastating consequences for the world. Within a desolate Los Angeles, during a period of Martial Law, we meet a lone stranger named 'Jake'. Reeling from the loss of his own family, while departing LA, Jake discovers a young girl named 'Lilly' in desperate need to reunite with her mother. Their journey takes them to Fort Mojave, a government accredited "safe zone" where Lilly's Mother is believed to be located. Their journey together across lawless terrain becomes challenging, and upon reaching their destination, Jake is denied access and new revelations are made about his past.
response.title: Bad Suns
